TextView.android:text: To mimic flat ground, move the treadmill's incline to 1 percent instead of 0. Ramp up the incline to 4 percent or more for hills.Instead of watching the minutes crawl by, pick a speed and incline that are challenging but doable and then focus on something other than the console for the duration of a motivating song on your playlist. When the song is over, check your distance and aim to beat it the next time around by punching up the pace.
